title: S16 Ep143: The Miracle Collectors
itunes:title: The Miracle Collectors
description:
Darkness Radio presents The Miracle Collectors: Uncovering Stories Of Wonder, Joy, and Mystery.

Today, we talk about stories of miracles and the concepts of miracles with the authors of The Miracle Collectors, Joan Luisa Hill and Katie Mahon.

Joan and Katie also share some miracle stories with us from the holidays and other times of the year that help restore our faith in humanity!

Get your copy of the book here: Â https://www.hachettebookgroup.com/titles/joan-luise-hill/the-miracle-collectors/9781546018001/
